TopicTitle: Armored Rover with Housing, Science Research, and good IVA steering (Uses MechJeb)

Articles.Content:
This is an all in one:

  • Kerbal home for 7
  • Science Research Facility+Communication Link
  • Armored Rover

There are 6 Mk. I Lander Cans inside, and one Cupola driver's capsule on the front, which is accessed by a laddered ramp on the inside of the vehicle.

Also on the inside is night or day power generation. On the top, there are science instruments and antennae, all of which are toggled with the 1 button. There are two ladders on the back of the vehicle to get to the ground, which can be toggled with G. On the outside, there are 25 Mk. I Illuminators, which are toggled by L.

All of this is carried by 8 RoveMax XXL Wheels.

Download: Download .craft file from Google Drive
